name: Jeff the Robot (Prototype)
description:
WASD to move, O to shoot

------

Art and Programming by Maxwell Des Cendres

Sound courtesy of freesound.org

-------

In the not-too-distant future, there once was a food delivery droid: J3-VF, or as his customers called him, "Jeff". He was well liked, as most robots were, until one fateful day, when a computer virus known as REJ began to infect his robot brethren: more specifically the "PAC Spheres" used to clear debris from roads and construction sites. Now instead of targeting garbage, the PAC Spheres will try to eat anything that moves.

The government was unable to get rid of these evil spheres, so Jeff took it upon himself, modifying his food cannons to instead shoot plasma.

tl;dr Jeff good, spheres bad. Kill them to win.
